## Address.asAddress() method

Optimistically coerce values into an Address

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static asAddress(address?: any): Address | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Anything you want to check is an Address |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Address](./opal.address.md) \| null
